past_running_background: Several local 5Ks and 10Ks over the past 3 years, occasional half marathon
recent_training: Solid base for 2 months, mostly steady runs with a few informal tempos
injuries: None currently, but has had IT band issues in the past
motivation: Wants to break 50 minutes in the 10K — and feel like they trained smarter this time
schedule_constraints: Works 9–6, flexible weekends. Can commit 45–60 minutes on weekdays.
shoes: Saucony Ride 16, rotating with an older pair of Kinvaras
surface: Mostly roads with a few trail segments
notes: Wants a plan that feels purposeful — not just busywork. Open to intensity, but doesn’t want to re-aggravate old injuries.
